metadata.title: CVE-2022-3627 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds write in _TIFFmemcpy inlibtiff/tif_unix.c:346 when called from extractImageSection,tools/tiffcrop.c:6860, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service viaa crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fixis available with commit 236b7191.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
